thread.title: Man's 72-hour bender in Mexico leads to hangover from hell as he wakes up with tattoos on EYELIDS
thread.title_full: Man's 72-hour bender in Mexico leads to hangover from hell as he wakes up with tattoos on EYELIDS

author: Nicholas Bieber
title: Man's 72-hour bender in Mexico leads to hangover from hell as he wakes up with tattoos on EYELIDS
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A 72 hour bender left one man with some painful regrets - after he woke up with tattoos on his eyelids. 
Jay, a daredevil base jumper from Melbourne, ended up at a laser tattoo removal company in December to have 'Party 2 Impact' lasered off. 
But unfortunately for the party-goer, the staff decided to heap further embarrassment on the man after the treatment by sharing his tale on their Instagram page. 
As well as details of what happened, the social media post included a video of the man wincing in pain as a technician works on his eyelids. Read More Britain's most tattooed man with 'Jeremy Kyle Show' inked on head reveals: "I was stabbed in hate crime" Melbourne man Jay won't be planning another 72-hour bender for a while yet (Photo: Instagram / mjdriverlasertattooremoval Follow) 
The post explained how Jay was enjoying himself a bit too much while holidaying in Mexico, where he had gone with some friends to jump off a crane. 
Tattoo removal company MJ Driver wrote in the caption: "When the weather took a turn for the worst, they ended up going on a 3 day bender. Apparently 50c Coronas were too good to refuse. 
"Anyways, after 72 hours of partying the trio woke up and Jay, being none the wiser, started having a good laugh at his friends who had covered their legs in amateur tattoos, until they started pointing and laughing at him. 
"Pretty quickly he realised he had "PARTY 2 IMPACT" tattooed on his eye lids." Read More The tattoo has now been removed - although his embarrassing tale lives on (Photo: Instagram / mjdriverlasertattooremoval Follow) 
They added: "Full 'hangover' moment. And now he finds himself here..." 
In the video footage, the professional can be heard calming Jay down telling him to relax and to take deep breaths throughout the procedure. 
A few minutes later, the black ink is finally covered by the white laser, although his embarrassing story lives on. Like us on Facebook
